mapper.select: SELECT brand, category, price FROM (SELECT brand, category, price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY category ORDER BY price) AS rn FROM product_info) t WHERE t.rn = 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT brand, sum(price) AS total FROM product_info GROUP BY brand) t ORDER BY total LIMIT 1

SELECT brand, price FROM product_info WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY price
DESC
LIMIT 1
